keyword: how many calories are in guinness stout
title: How Many Calories Are in Guinness Stout?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in Guinness stout per standard 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in Guinness Stout?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) serving of Guinness Draught stout; values based on typical nutritional data for the unpasteurized canned or bottled version.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by specific variety (e.g., Draught vs. Foreign Extra), serving size, and brewing batch. Check labels or official sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz serving of Guinness stout contains about 125 calories and 10 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a 12 oz Guinness stout?
faqs.a: Approximately 125 calories per 12 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: Does Guinness stout have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: About 9.6 g carbs per serving, with 0 g sugars; carbs come from malted barley.

faqs.q: Is Guinness stout low in fat or protein?
faqs.a: Yes, 0 g fat and 1 g protein per 12 oz serving.

faqs.q: How does serving size affect calories in Guinness?
faqs.a: Calories scale with volume; a 16 oz pint has about 167 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in Guinness stout?
faqs.a: Around 40 mg per 12 oz serving, relatively low for beer.
